title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Competencies: Group Learning Regulation (SSRL)-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and group collaboration experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learner groups can systematically implement shared regulatory strategies during math problem-solving using the SSRL framework
Learners can independently design SSRL facilitation activity structures with over 80% accuracy using LD tools (e.g., learning design canvas)
Learners can identify at least three SSRL activity patterns within groups using LA tools (e.g., mobile app log analysis)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
